mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOC( DOC_NO, DOC_TYPE, DOC_TITLE, DOC_CONTENT, DOC_DATE, DOC_WRITER, START_DATE, END_DATE, TOTAL_DAYS, NEWMODIFY_TIME, EMERGENCY_CONTACT, MEMO, ATT_STATUS, TARGET_EMP_NO, TARGET_DEPT_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME ) VALUES( #{docNo}, #{docType}, #{docTitle}, #{docContent}, SYSDATE, #{docWriter}, #{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalDays, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newmodifyTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emergencyContact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetEmpNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetDeptNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originName}, #{changeName} )

INSERT INTO approve( approve_no, emp_no, doc_no, step1_status, step1_manager_no, step2_status, step2_manager_no ) VALUES ( approve_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{docNo}, #{step1Status}, #{step1ManagerNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{step2Status}, #{step2ManagerNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT D.DEPT_NO AS DEPT_NO, M.EMP_NO AS MANAGER_EMP_NO, M.EMP_NAME AS MANAGER_EMP_NAME FROM EMP U INNER JOIN DEPT D ON U.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO INNER JOIN EMP M ON D.MANAGER_EMP_NO = M.EMP_NO WHERE U.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT D.DEPT_NO, D.DEPT_NAME, D.PARENT_DEPT_NO AS MY_PARENT_DEPT_NO,
PD.DEPT_NO AS PARENT_DEPT_NO, PD.MANAGER_EMP_NO AS PARENT_MANAGER_EMP_NO,
M.EMP_NAME AS PARENT_MANAGER_NAME, M.EMP_PHONE AS PARENT_MANAGER_PHONE, M.EMP_EMAIL AS PARENT_MANAGER_EMAIL
FROM DEPT D LEFT JOIN DEPT PD ON D.PARENT_DEPT_NO = PD.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN EMP M ON PD.MANAGER_EMP_NO = M.EMP_NO
WHERE D.DEPT_NO = #{deptNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT D.DOC_NO, D.DOC_TITLE, D.DOC_DATE, U.EMP_NAME AS writerName, M1.EMP_NAME AS step1ManagerName, M2.EMP_NAME AS step2ManagerName, CASE WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'R' OR A.STEP2_STATUS = 'R' THEN '반려' WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'W' AND A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} THEN '1차 대기' WHEN A.STEP2_STATUS = 'W' AND A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' OR A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO IS NULL) THEN '2차 대기' WHEN A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A' AND (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' OR A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO IS NULL) THEN '최종 승인' ELSE '진행 중' END AS progressStatus FROM APPROVE A JOIN DOC D ON A.DOC_NO = D.DOC_NO JOIN EMP U ON A.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN EMP M1 ON A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = M1.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN EMP M2 ON A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = M2.EMP_NO WHERE ( (A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP1_STATUS = 'W') OR (A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'W' AND (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' OR A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO IS NULL)) ) OR ( (A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A') OR (A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A') OR (A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP1_STATUS = 'R') OR (A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'R') ) ORDER BY D.DOC_DATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT D.DOC_NO AS docNo, D.DOC_TITLE AS docTitle, D.DOC_DATE AS docDate, M1.EMP_NAME AS step1ManagerName, M2.EMP_NAME AS step2ManagerName, CASE WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'R' OR A.STEP2_STATUS = 'R' THEN '반려' WHEN (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A') OR (A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO IS NULL AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A') THEN '최종 승인' WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'W' THEN '2차 대기' WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'X' AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'W' THEN '2차 대기' WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'W' THEN '1차 대기' ELSE '대기' END AS progressStatus, CASE WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'R' OR A.STEP2_STATUS = 'R' THEN 'REJECT' WHEN (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A') OR (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'X' AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A') THEN 'FINISH' ELSE 'ACTIVE' END AS COMPLETION_TYPE FROM APPROVE A JOIN DOC D ON A.DOC_NO = D.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN EMP M1 ON A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = M1.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN EMP M2 ON A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = M2.EMP_NO WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY D.DOC_NO DESC ) RESULT_TABLE
COMPLETION_TYPE = 'ACTIVE'
COMPLETION_TYPE = 'REJECT'
COMPLETION_TYPE = 'FINISH'
AND ROWNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT R.*, ROWNUM RNUM_ FROM ( SELECT D.DOC_NO, D.DOC_TITLE, D.DOC_DATE, U.EMP_NAME AS writerName, M1.EMP_NAME AS step1ManagerName, M2.EMP_NAME AS step2ManagerName, CASE WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'W' AND A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} THEN '1차 대기' WHEN A.STEP2_STATUS = 'W' AND A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' OR A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO IS NULL) THEN '2차 대기' ELSE '대기 중' END AS progressStatus FROM APPROVE A JOIN DOC D ON A.DOC_NO = D.DOC_NO JOIN EMP U ON A.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN EMP M1 ON A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = M1.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN EMP M2 ON A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = M2.EMP_NO WHERE ( (A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP1_STATUS = 'W') OR (A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'W' AND (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' OR A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO IS NULL)) ) ORDER BY D.DOC_DATE DESC ) R ) T WHERE T.RNUM_ <= #{limit}

SELECT d.*, w.EMP_NAME AS writerName, m1.EMP_NAME AS step1ManagerName, m2.EMP_NAME AS step2ManagerName, a.STEP1_STATUS, a.STEP2_STATUS, a.STEP1_MANAGER_NO, a.STEP2_MANAGER_NO, a.REJECT_REASON FROM DOC d JOIN EMP w ON d.DOC_WRITER = w.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN APPROVE a ON d.DOC_NO = a.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN EMP m1 ON a.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = m1.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN EMP m2 ON a.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = m2.EMP_NO WHERE d.DOC_NO = #{docNo}
mapper.update:
UPDATE APPROVE
STEP1_STATUS = #{status}, STEP1_APPROVE_DATE = SYSDATE
STEP2_STATUS = #{status}, STEP2_APPROVE_DATE = SYSDATE
WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo}
mapper.select: SELECT T.COMPLETION_TYPE AS STATUSTYPE, COUNT(T.COMPLETION_TYPE) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'R' OR A.STEP2_STATUS = 'R' THEN 'REJECT' WHEN (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A') OR (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'X' AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A') THEN 'FINISH' ELSE 'ACTIVE' END AS COMPLETION_TYPE FROM APPROVE A WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ) T GROUP BY T.COMPLETION_TYPE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT D.DOC_NO, D.DOC_TITLE, D.DOC_DATE, D.DOC_TYPE, U.EMP_NAME AS writerName,
-- 알림 유형 구분을 위해 'WAITING'이라는 고정 필드를 추가 (Java에서 AlertVO.type 결정) 'WAITING' AS completionType
FROM APPROVE A JOIN DOC D ON A.DOC_NO = D.DOC_NO JOIN EMP U ON A.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO
WHERE ( (A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP1_STATUS = 'W') OR (A.STEP2_MANAGER_NO = #{empNo} AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'W' AND (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' OR A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO IS NULL)) ) ORDER BY D.DOC_DATE DESC ) R
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT D.DOC_NO, D.DOC_TITLE, D.DOC_DATE, D.DOC_TYPE, U.EMP_NAME AS writerName,
-- 최종 상태 구분을 위한 필드 추가 (Java에서 AlertVO.type 결정) CASE WHEN A.STEP1_STATUS = 'R' OR A.STEP2_STATUS = 'R' THEN 'REJECT' ELSE 'FINISH' END AS completionType
FROM APPROVE A JOIN DOC D ON A.DOC_NO = D.DOC_NO JOIN EMP U ON A.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO
WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND ( (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'R' OR A.STEP2_STATUS = 'R') -- 반려 OR ( (A.STEP1_STATUS = 'A' AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A') OR (A.STEP1_MANAGER_NO IS NULL AND A.STEP2_STATUS = 'A') ) -- 최종 승인 ) ORDER BY D.DOC_DATE DESC ) RESULT_TABLE
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT D.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, D.PARENT_DEPT_NO AS parentDeptNo, D.MANAGER_EMP_NO AS managerEmpNo, M1.EMP_NAME AS managerName, PD.MANAGER_EMP_NO AS parentManagerEmpNo, M2.EMP_NAME AS parentManagerName FROM EMP E LEFT JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN EMP M1 ON D.MANAGER_EMP_NO = M1.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN DEPT PD ON D.PARENT_DEPT_NO = PD.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN EMP M2 ON PD.MANAGER_EMP_NO = M2.EMP_NO WHERE E.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
